publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights— That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament.

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights—That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament. (lodged on 23 July)

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights—That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament.
S1M-89 Human Rights (lodged on 23 July 1999) Robin Harper*

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights—That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament. Supported by: Robin Harper
S1M-89 Human Rights (lodged on 23 July 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-89 Human Rights (lodged on 23 July 1999) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights—That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament. Supported by: Robin Harper, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-89 Human Rights (lodged on 23 July 1999) Linda Fabiani*

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights—That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament. Supported by: Robin Harper, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Linda Fabiani

S1M-89 Donald Gorrie: Human Rights-That the Parliament calls upon the Equal Opportunities Committee and the Procedures Committee to consider varying the remit of the Equal Opportunities Committee so that it is also responsible for considering and reporting on matters relating to human rights and upon the observance in the Parliament of the European Convention on Human Rights and other international agreements relating to human rights binding on the Parliament. Supported by: Robin Harper, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Linda Fabiani
S1M-89 Human Rights (lodged on 23 July 1999) Fergus Ewing*
